All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminView
This class is the view for the admin front end of the application.
AppView
Main driver class that allows the user to choose between the admin and moviegoer modes depending on the user's choice, it calls methods from the appropriate controller class.
Booking
Class that stores the booking details of a moviegoer, for a movie showing.
BookingController
Controller class that handles the creation of bookings, and also handles the saving and loading of booking data
Cinema
Cinema is a class that represents a cinema in a cineplex Contains the cinemaID, classType, seatingPlan, row, column, and cineplex
Cinema.classType
Enum for the type of Cinema, which will affect the final booking price.
CinemaController
Controller class that manages the creation of cinemas and their layouts, also saving and loading of the cineplexes
Movie
Movie is a class that stores information about a movie, including its name, length, status, synopsis, director, cast, total rating, review count, and ticket sales
MovieController
Controller class that handles the creation, deletion, and editing of Movies, as well as displaying the parameters.
MovieGoer
The MovieGoer class contains the attributes of a moviegoer, representing something like an account.
MovieGoerController
Controller class that handles the creation, deletion, and modification of moviegoer accounts
MovieGoerView
This class is the view for the movie-goer application.
Review
The Review class represents a review of a movie.
ReviewController
Controller class that handles the creation, modification of Reviews for Movies.
Seat
A seat is a space in the Cinema that can be occupied by a moviegoer.
Seat.seatType
Enum for the type of Seat, which will affect the final booking price.
SettingsController
Controller class that holds all the settings for the cinema, such as ticket prices, cinema prices, holidays, discounts, etc
Showing
The Showing class contains a showing movie, a showing time, a cinema, and a seating plan.
ShowingController
Controller class that handles the creation, deletion, and modification of Showings for Movies.
showingStatus
 
showingStatus
Enum for the showing status of the Movie, which determines if Bookings can be made for it.
